member.name: T:BarTender.GroupPane
member.summary: Control representing one group within a . It renders borders, a expand/collapse button, a text and an image and positions on inner control within the inner area of the group. The properties needed for this are fetched from the associated . Cannot be used as a standalone control.

member.name: M:BarTender.GroupPane.#ctor(BarTender.GroupPaneBar)
member.summary: Creates a new instance

member.name: M:BarTender.GroupPane.Expand
member.summary: Expands the group. If the group is already expanded nothing happens. If the associated has animation enabled then setting this property will also result in an animation effect.

member.name: M:BarTender.GroupPane.Expand(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Expands the group. If the group is already expanded nothing happens.
member.param: Indicates whether the expand should be animated or not.

member.name: M:BarTender.GroupPane.Collapse
member.summary: Collapes the group. If the group is already collapsed nothing happens. If the associated has animation enabled then setting this property will also result in an animation effect.

member.name: M:BarTender.GroupPane.Collapse(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Collapes the group. If the group is already collapsed nothing happens.
member.param: Indicates whether the collapse should be animated or not.

member.name: M:BarTender.GroupPane.OnMouseMove(System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs)
member.summary: Raises the event. It also changes the highlighting of the button, when the mouse is moved over it and shows the appropriate resize cursor.

member.name: M:BarTender.GroupPane.OnMouseLeave(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Raises the event. It also resets the button in case it is showing a resize cursor.

member.name: M:BarTender.GroupPane.OnMouseUp(System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs)
member.summary: Raises the event. It also stops the resize operation.

member.name: M:BarTender.GroupPane.OnMouseDown(System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs)
member.summary: Raises the event. It also toggles the expansion when the button is clicked or starts the resize operation.

member.summary: Gets/sets the height of the group when being expanded. If the group is currently expanded it is immediatly set to the new height.

member.summary: Gets/sets the control which should be shown in the inner area of the control.

member.name: P:BarTender.GroupPaneBar.ShowExpandCollapseButton
member.summary: Gets/sets whether the collpase/expand button should be shown or not. If this property is set to false but is set to true than the user can expand/collapse the group by simply clicking into the header.

member.name: P:BarTender.GroupPaneBar.MinimumExpandedHeight
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum height the groups should have when they are expanded. Thus the user won't be able to resize it to less than this given value.

member.summary: Gets whether there is currently and expand/collapse animation running.
